reviewText: This was a film strip that was shown to just about all California Fire Fighters at one time or another. It stresses, and explains how the mutual aid system allows for the fire departments to work together to handle many fires and even historicly major fires at the same time. The same system has been tested many times since.

The VCFD originally used this as a training video for the rookies. I first viewed this back in 1984. It was good then and it is great now as it recaps the historical fires of 1971 throughout the state of California and locally here in Ventura County.
